channel.title: The HUD on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in The HUD on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Options HUD screen
item.description: Options HUD screen Enable when using the ZAP Desktop When set the HUD will be injected into HTML responses when the ZAP Desktop is used. This defaults to true. Enable when using ZAP in daemon mode When set the HUD will be injected into HTML responses when ZAP is started in daemon or ‘headless’ mode.
